name: #Cubing4Life
description:
Currently in Alpha 4.1:

  1. Infinite Runner & 1 Level is available, more coming soon!
  2.  Press A or Left Arrow Key to go left, D or Right Arrow Key to go right, and P or Escape to pause the game.
  3.  There are 3 obstacles;
    1.  A row of Cubes
    2.  A row of Rectangular Prisms
    3.  A diagonal of Cubes (Inverse & Flipped as well)
    4.  A Wide Rectangular Prism
    5.  3 Long Rectangular Prisms
  4.  There are 2 special objects
    1.  A Ramp
    2.  A Speed Boost
    3. A Bouncing Object
    4.  A Slow Down
  5.  You move faster the longer you play
  6.  The score is how many obstacles you have passed

Suggestions for any new obstacles are welcome.

The current high score is: 106

Music: http://www.purple-planet.com - Love Life
